name: 3L3CTRIC SH33P
description:
3 Hours. 3 Developers. 33 IQ.

We have created a spicy game that kind of works for Trijam 78. You are a dreaming drone who must confront deadly electric sheep. The sheep were supposed to telegraph their attacks, but they usually don't. Good luck!

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement.

Left Mouse Button to attack.

Zuratu: Art

NegativeZero (royalstove): Music / Sound Design

Timmay: Code
